## This year, our flagship Sponsors Exhibition that attracts over 500 students each year has gone virtual, on Hopin!
Whether you are looking for an internship or graduate role, or simply want to know more about the industry, we really recommend you come along and tune in as itâ€™s a great way to get in direct contact with recruiters and engineers from highly regarded companies and should provide invaluable insight into the recruitment process.
The event will take place on Wednesday 14th October 1-4pm.
**Look out for sign up links, which we will send out soon!**
